original_title: Ámbar: El color de una familia perfecta
overview: Ámbar is a voluptuous woman who entertains the attendees of a luxurious venue night after night with her show. She is Paul who returns from Canada with Tibeu to fight for the family cohabitation regime of his little son, Guillermo, from whom his ex-wife, Amanda, has distanced him for a long time, after she discovered him in his own home. being unfaithful
title: Ámbar: El color de una familia perfecta
